content: one of my favorite ways to decorate for the holidays is with handmade crochet snowflakes crochet snowflakes are so easy and fun to make they are quick and fun to make you can make a bunch of them in no time at all and they are perfectly suitable for beginners today am sharing the tutorial for easy nordic crochet snowflake pattern the pattern is quite simple and easy i love crochet snowflakes because they are so very beautiful and can be used in so many ways you can hang a few as ornaments on your christmas tree or on the windows or mantel use the as toppers for your christmas gifts materials used - 4 ply cotton knitting yarn 4 mm crochet hook size - 4 5 inches checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/mdjlvms6uyo
